segments.title: Bread Pudding
steps: Dry the ['ing']{Brioche loaf} (if not stale) in an air fryer at ['temp']{60} for 20-30 min on each side, shaking occasionally.
Beat ['ing']{Medium eggs}, ['ing']{Sugar}, ['ing']{Cinnamon}, ['ing']{Vanilla extract}, and ['ing']{Fine sea salt}. Gradually whisk in ['ing']{Whole milk} until smooth.
In a buttered baking dish, add dried brioche cubes. Then, pour custard evenly over them.
Press gently to submerge bread. Let soak 30-45 min.
Broil 5-10 min for a golden top.

segments.title: Vanilla Custard Sauce (Cr√®me Anglaise)
steps: Heat ['ing']{Whole milk}, ['ing']{Heavy cream}, and ['ing']{Vanilla extract} until steaming.
Whisk ['ing']{Egg yolks}, ['ing']{Sugar} and salt until pale. Slowly pour hot milk into yolks, whisking.
Return to low heat; stir constantly until it coats the spoon (~['temp']{82}).

segments.title: Mascarpone Whipped Cream
steps: Gradually add ['ing']{Heavy cream}, whipping to soft peaks.

segments.title: Lemon Curd Sauce
steps: Whisk ['ing']{Egg yolks}, ['ing']{Sugar}, ['ing']{Lemon juice}, ['ing']{Zest of lemon}, and salt in a double boiler.
Cook, stirring constantly, until thick (10+ min).
Off heat, whisk in ['ing']{Unsalted butter} until smooth.
